text: Aluminium arsenide is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is AlAs. It has aluminium and arsenide ions in it. ==Properties and preparation== Aluminium arsenide is an orange solid. It is toxic because it has arsenic in it. It is a semiconductor. It reacts with acids to make arsine. It is made by reacting aluminium and arsenic. ==Related pages== *Aluminium antimonide *Zinc arsenide *Arsenite ==Sources== Category:Aluminium compounds Category:Arsenic compounds
title: Aluminium arsenide
